title: ISTV — Internet Streaming TeleVision (Audio + Video)
blurb: Unified decentralized streaming for audio and video channels with signed manifests and swarm delivery.
description: ISTV combines ISAN (audio) and ISVN (video) to let anyone run continuous channels or VOD catalogs. Publishers ingest and transcode audio/video, chunk and sign segments, and announce via DHT. Viewers fetch via peer swarms (WebRTC/QUIC) with HTTP/CDN fallback. Manifests define identity, schedules, renditions, and optional monetization. This page provides a dependency-free HTML audio+video demo player.
